text:
e="preserve">Scott Thomas Erskine (December 22, 1962 – July 3, 2020) was an American serial killer on California's death row. He was convicted in 2003 for the 1993 murder of two California boys. He was incarcerated at San Quentin State Prison. He was born in San Diego, California.
Erskine died on July 3, 2020 from COVID-19 in California, aged 57.
